mapper.select: select USER_NAME from t_user where USER_NAME = #{username} and VALID_STATE = '1'
select distinct USER_NAME userName, USER_PASSWORD password, USER_ID userId from t_user where USER_NAME = #{userName} and VALID_STATE = '1'

select distinct USER_ID userId, USER_NAME userName, USER_PHONE userPhone, USER_ADDRESS userAddress, USER_DESC userDescribe, ROLE_TYPE roleType from t_user where VALID_STATE = '1' limit ${start} ${size}
select count(1) total from t_user where VALID_STATE = '1'

mapper.update: update t_user set USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress}, USER_DESC = #{userDescribe} where USER_ID = #{userId} and VALID_STATE = '1'
